findings.title: Unlimited Loop Iteration in distributeRewards and isStakeholder
findings.description: In distributeRewards and isStakeholder functions, the for loop does not have a stakeholders length limit, which increases gas costs.

findings.title: Ambiguous error message
findings.description: The above-mentioned error message does not explain exactly the error of the operation.

findings.title: Use the latest solidity version
findings.description: Using the latest solidity will prevent any compiler-level bugs.
